name: Greentape
description: In store product ratings on your phone.
overview:
Greentape is reinventing the in-store shopping experience.

To start we are bringing Amazon-style reviews and other e-commerce conveniences to the in-store shopping experience.

We developed the first 100% connection-free location tracking technology, and mobile app, that can determine your in-store location while your phone is in your pocket.

The first mission of our app is to automatically show shoppers ratings on the products in front of them. No barcode scanning or photo taking required. The second mission to is give brands and retailers a real-time dashboard of shopper data that can help them both sell their current products faster and give them the data they need to make better products in the future.

milestones.description: Added Customer Whole Foods Market, North Atlantic Region, 35 Locations
